configurableProperties.name: enabled
configurableProperties.description: Enable or disable a trail effect that follows behind the editor cursor as it moves around.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: Enable or disable a trail effect that follows behind the editor cursor as it moves around.

configurableProperties.name: type
configurableProperties.description: The type of cursor trail to use. 'solid' will create a continuous connected trail that follows your editor cursor around, while 'disconnected' will create 'trail segments' that follow your cursor around in a disconnected manner, collapsing into themselves as they expire.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The type of cursor trail to use. **solid** will create a continuous connected trail that follows your editor cursor around, while **disconnected** will create *trail segments* that follow your cursor around in a disconnected manner, collapsing into themselves as they expire.

configurableProperties.name: disconnectedTrailSegmentLifetime
configurableProperties.description: The lifetime - in milliseconds - of each trail segment that gets left behind by the cursor as it moves.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The lifetime - in **milliseconds** - of each trail segment that gets left behind by the cursor as it moves.

configurableProperties.name: color
configurableProperties.description: The color of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The color of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves.

configurableProperties.name: maxSolidTrailLength
configurableProperties.description: The maximum length of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves, in pixels.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The maximum length of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves, in **pixels**.

configurableProperties.name: solidTrailWidth
configurableProperties.description: The width of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves, in pixels.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The width of the trail that follows behind the cursor as it moves, in **pixels**.

configurableProperties.name: solidTrailSpeed
configurableProperties.description: The speed at which the trail should pursue the cursor, in pixels/second
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The speed at which the trail should pursue the cursor, in **pixels/second**.
